title: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Brianna Noelle Rosendale (August 31, 2024)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, Chapter 119, I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) footage related to the arrest of Brianna Noelle Rosendale on or about August 31, 2024, by the Suwannee County Sheriff's Office.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Suwannee County Sheriff's Office personnel during the detention, investigation, or arrest of Brianna Noelle Rosendale.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the booking time is listed as 6:27 AM, I request responsive footage from approximately 5:00 AM to 8:00 AM on August 31, 2024.

If any portions of the requested footage are exempt or confidential, please produce the non-exempt portions and cite the specific legal exemptions justifying any withholding or redaction.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor but request notification if the costs will exceed $50. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
